Pieter

it´s similar.. but unfortunely not that one!  
The “e” is the same but the rest ist too rounded, look at the “s” for exapmple.

I looked at Chalet, Bauhaus, others and couldn’t find an exact match for all the characters.

Where is your sample from, is it pre-digital perhaps?
I don´t think so, it´s from the poster of the movie “Breezy” (´73). It looks like avantgarde but the “e” and the “y” are very special ....

If it’s from 1973, then yes, it is pre-digital. I think this could be Avant Garde.

- Lex
I had the same thought, Lex. Avant Garde has the lighter weight too, which Chalet lacks.
